abort.already_in_progress: Configuration flow is already in progress
abort.no_devices_found: No supported LeaOne devices found in range; If the device is in range, ensure it has been activated in the last few minutes. If you need clarification on whether the device is in-range, download the diagnostics for the integration that provides your Bluetooth adapter or proxy and check if the MAC address of the LeaOne device is present.

bluetooth_confirm.description: Do you want to set up {name}?

user.description: Choose a device to set up
